name: Tres Dawg
description: The rare indica-dominant hybrid Tres Dawg by Top Dawg Seeds comes from Afghani #1 and a backcrossed Chemdawg. Tres Dawg gave rise to other prized hybrids like Stardawg, Dawg's Waltz, and Appalachia.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Focused, Sleepy, Happy, Stress, Depression, Pain, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy
